marklogic.body: Though I know you say this is thought Vomit for yourself, I totally and completely sympathize - this precise issue is what is on my mind so much of the time.Â And though you hate advice, I would say that...after college it should get better?Â Depending on your situation - being less dependent on your parents, at least for me, means that I don't have to listen to their unhelpful/judgmental "advice" about being an English major/wanting to be a writer.
